comments.body: nit: the `s` right after the double back-ticks sometimes causes problems when rendering, but I am not sure what the actual logic is. Hopefully can be caught when rendering the release note
You're right, needs to be ``` ``dtype``\ s```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +3,7 @@On any given platform, two of ``np.intc``, ``np.int_``, and ``np.longlong``
would previously appear indistinguishable through their ``repr``, despite
having different properties when wrapped into ``dtype``s.
A similar problem existed for the unsigned counterparts to these types, and on
some plaforms for ``np.double`` and ``np.longdouble``
